lightracer

Class HeaderPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • lightracer.HeaderPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class HeaderPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    HeaderPanel is a class that displays relevant info to the game of light racer currently running. It contains displays for the number of wins of each player as well as a timer display that shows status messages when the timer is not active.
    Author:
    Alex Reiff
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • updateTimer

        public void updateTimer(double interval)
        Updates the timer display with the time elapsed of the current game.
        Parameters:
        interval - the time elapsed since the last time the timer was updated

      • p1Wins

        public void p1Wins(int p1win)
        Updates the display when player 1 wins a round.
        Parameters:
        p1win - the total number of rounds player 1 has won in the current game.

        Updates the display when player 2 wins a round.

        p2win - the total number of rounds player 2 has won in the current game.
